data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 119 believers in the state of Al Dali' to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Dali‘, Yemen
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Al Dali‘, Yemen to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.section_summary: On average, 38 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Al Dali‘, Yemen.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Al Dali'. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Al Dali‘, Yemen know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Arab, Iraqi people. Make the Arab, Iraqi people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Al Dali‘, Yemen.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Al Dali‘, Yemen.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Al Dali‘, Yemen to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

location.name: Al Dali'
location.cities_list: Aḑ Ḑāli‘, Al Madu, Al Ḩusayn, Ḑawrān, Dhī Jalāl
location.cities_list_w_pop: Aḑ Ḑāli‘ (14,760), Al Madu (1,986), Al Ḩusayn, Ḑawrān, Dhī Jalāl
